{{WikiProject Germany|class=FA|importance=Low}} }} {{User:WildBot/m04|sect={{User:WildBot/m03|1|Grand Fleet#1st Battlecruiser Squadron|1st Battlecruiser Squadron}}, {{User:WildBot/m03|1|Grand Fleet#1st Light Cruiser Squadron|1st Light Cruiser Squadron}}, {{User:WildBot/m03|1|Grand Fleet#2nd Battle Squadron|2nd Battle Squadron}}, {{User:WildBot/m03|1|Grand Fleet#2nd Battlecruiser Squadron|2nd Battlecruiser Squadron}}, {{User:WildBot/m03|2|Grand Fleet#2nd Light Cruiser Squadron|2nd Light Cruiser Squadron}}|m04}} ==Who are you?== "Chief of Staff of the Prussian Army in the mid 18th century" or "19th century German general"? Which is it? [[User:Trekphiler|TREKphiler]] [[User talk:Trekphiler|hit me â™  ]] 05:12, 14 December 2008 (UTC) :Another dang typo...thanks for pointing that out. Your section header made me think of [[The Who]] :) [[User:Parsecboy|Parsecboy]] ([[User talk:Parsecboy|talk]]) 13:27, 14 December 2008 (UTC) ==Armament layout== The article needs to be clearer as to the distribution of the main battery, looking at the pics, it looks like 5x2 turrets, with three turrets on the centreline and two wing turrets, but someone with a source should put it in the article.[[User:KTo288|KTo288]] ([[User talk:KTo288|talk]]) 09:49, 7 April 2010 (UTC) :I've added a description of the main battery. I had left this sort of technical detail for the class article, but can see how it would be useful here. Regards, [[User:Parsecboy|Parsecboy]] ([[User talk:Parsecboy|talk]]) 11:33, 7 April 2010 (UTC) ::Thanks.[[User:KTo288|KTo288]] ([[User talk:KTo288|talk]]) 17:24, 8 April 2010 (UTC) == [[:File:SMS Moltke Hampton Roads 1912 FINAL.jpg]] to appear as POTD soon == Hello! This is a note to let the editors of this article know that [[:File:SMS Moltke Hampton Roads 1912 FINAL.jpg]] will be appearing as [[Wikipedia:picture of the day|picture of the day]] on August 23, 2011. You can view and edit the POTD blurb at [[Template:POTD/2011-08-23]]. If this article needs any attention or maintenance, it would be preferable if that could be done before its appearance on the [[Main Page]] so Wikipedia doesn't look bad. :) Thanks! '''[[User:Howcheng|howcheng]]''' {[[User talk:Howcheng|chat]]} 20:43, 20 August 2011 (UTC) {{POTD/2011-08-23}}
